chairman_id = #{chairmanId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
people_num = #{peopleNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
level = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
